nodes.bodyText: StorageMinecartEntity doesn't seem to have dropContentsWhenDead - i assume it's a forge method
It is, but it just accesses a field. Can you use an accessor mixin (following our naming conventions) and add a TODO? Seems like this could cause a hard to track bug.
It's the same behaviour as forge now - what do you mean by adding a // TODO? What should it say?
